title: WATCH: Media Freaks After Spicer Tells Female Reporter How to Behave During Press Briefing
text:
Democrats Have Forgotten When They Supported Obama Sanctuary Punishments 
Ryan followed that up with a negatively framed question about Trump meeting with former Secretary of State Condoleeza Rice, an open Trump critic, but apparently continued to shake her head as Spicer attempted to frame a positive response. You can watch most of the exchange right here, but pay close attention to Spicer’s answer, as the media completely ignored it: Wow. Spicer being shitty to @AprilDRyan Part two: "Stop shaking your head again!" Sean, April is not the one. Trust me. pic.twitter.com/6Nlf3soihw 
— Tommy Christopher (@tommyxtopher) March 28, 2017 
“It seems like you’re hellbent on trying to make sure that whatever image you want to tell about this White House stays,” Spicer stated, before being interrupted again by Ryan, adding, “You’re asking me a question and I’m going to answer it, which is, the president — stop shaking your head again.” Advertisement - story continues below 
That exchange prompted a Twitter-meltdown of the snowflake journalists — much of it documented by Twitchy — who feel they can dish out attack after unsubstantiated attack but shrink like violets as soon as anything resembling pushback comes their way. "Stop shaking your head again," Spicer lectures @AprilDRyan , who is a grown woman. 
— Maggie Haberman (@maggieNYT) March 28, 2017 
Well Ms. Maggie Haberman , if Ryan really is a “grown woman,” then she should have no problem handling someone asking her to stop shaking her head “no” while he’s trying to answer he questions. "Stop shaking your head again," Spicer tells @AprilDRyan , who can do whatever she wants with her head 
— Jennifer Epstein (@jeneps) March 28, 2017 Advertisement - story continues below
